instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 HWMonitor shows Battery current 253A when charging
threads.message:
Hi,
This board boots fine, charging fine, but when charging HWMonitor displays Battery current around 253A.
I checked on another working board, same result. Is this a bug with HWMonitor?

threads.title: 820-3476 HWMonitor shows Battery current 253A when charging
threads.message:
Post resistance (ohm scale) between pins 17/18 of U7100.
Check R7151/52 and their traces.
Also post CHGR_BMON and SMC_BMON_ISENSE voltages.
